mobs.long_desc: A fat, bloated, pulsating humanoid stands here.
mobs.desc: Fat and grotesque, this creature is both disgusting and horrifying to behold. It has a bloated, vaguely humanoid, body of varying colours, mostly sick pinks and purples. Pulsating arteries lie just below the surface of its skin, constantly moving about. Its wet, slimy body hair reeks of death and decay.

mobs.long_desc: A wide, short, rocky looking humanoid is standing here.
mobs.desc: You see a stout looking humanoid creature, made almost purely of rock. Wide and short, the sheer bulk of this creature makes it look extremely dangerous. Despite its size, it appears very quick and mobile.

mobs.long_desc: A humanoid insect-man stands here, towering above you.
mobs.desc: You see a 7 foot tall humanoid insect covered in great chitinous plates. It has long, lanky arms and legs, a wide, armoured skull, and long, sharp claws that look like they could easily cut you to ribbons.

mobs.long_desc: A humanoid with pearly grey skin stands here.
mobs.desc: You see a humanoid with grey, pearly skin. It has a hairless, muscular body of no apparent gender. Its eyes are empty and milky-white, deeply set into its long, distorted features. In its visage, you can see the tortured soul of some hapless mortal who ventured into a place too deadly for the adventurer. Be careful, or its fate could be yours!

mobs.long_desc: A scaly red humanoid with one large arm stands here.
mobs.desc: You see a horrible creature with two unequal sized arms, one man-sized and the other giant-sized. It is a large humanoid creature with scaly red skin and bulky muscles. Its facial features are both hateful and alien.

mobs.long_desc: A massive grey slug is crawling around here.
mobs.desc: Huge and slimy, this is not the ideal housepet.

mobs.long_desc: A large grey worm is slithering along here.
mobs.desc: Chewing away at the surrounding rock, you now know how these tunnels were probably constructed. The borer worm looks like it could cut through you as easily as it cuts through rock.

mobs.long_desc: A monstrous grey spider is running around here.
mobs.desc: Monstrously huge, this hairy grey spider give you a severely disconcerting case of the willies.

mobs.long_desc: A shadowy figure flits about here.
mobs.desc: Barely visible, the shadow flits about the room, keeping a close eye on you. You better keep a close eye on it too!

mobs.long_desc: A man stands here, garbed all in grey.
mobs.desc: A tall, strong-looking man stands here. He is garbed all in grey, the colour of the stone gods he worships so proudly.

mobs.long_desc: A creature made of pure rock stands guard here.
mobs.desc: This creature could never be mistaken for a human being. Its rough, rocky features are obviously artificial and the emptyness in its eyes is chilling. The golem has no emotions and will feel no remorse when it kills you.

mobs.keywords: highpriest high priest statue grey gray stone
mobs.long_desc: A living statue of solid grey stone stands here.
mobs.desc: He would almost look human, if it weren't for the fact that he was made of solid stone. The high stone priest emanates the purest of evil.

mobs.long_desc: A giant stone statue of a sorcerer towers above you.
mobs.desc: This statue is huge and towers nearly to the top of the cavern.  It is in the form of a sorcerer in a battle pose, casting lightning from one hand and brandishing a stone dagger in the other.  It is wearing a light battle robe and has an amulet dangling on its chest.

mobs.keywords: arre matu monk peaceful consent Questmaster
mobs.long_desc: Arre Matu stands here, calmly looking peaceful and content.
mobs.desc: Arre Matu is a hero of old.  She has a peaceful look on her face, and appears graceful and agile of body.  There is no real way to be certain of her age, yet she is strikingly beautiful and appears young and vibrant.  The slender smile that parts her lips probably never leaves Arre, as her entire nature seems relaxed.

mobs.long_desc: A slender priest stands here passively chanting.
mobs.desc: This priest is slimly built, and muscular and lean in body.  His arms are long and well toned, while his legs are thick and powerful.  He wears a robe that seems to actually be part of his body.  The hood is pulled up, covering his head which appears to have almost white hair.

objects.ground: A stone flask lies among the rocks here.

extras.text: Unlike the standard wizard's flask, which is made of glass, this flask is made of a heavy grey stone, making it difficult to see what is inside.

objects.ground: A stone club lies among the rocks here.

extras.text: It's a very heavy club made of granite or some other grey stone.  It would probably be very effective as a weapon, if you are strong enough to wield it.

objects.ground: A small circular rock catches your eye.

extras.text: It's a circular piece of stone that could probably fit around a small finger. It has a strange, unpolished part, though - maybe it was broken off of something?

objects.ground: A grey staff has been left on the ground here.

extras.text: It's a long grey staff.  Touching it, you can feel the chill of cold stone, though it seems pretty light for something made of stone.  Maybe it's enchanted.

objects.ground: A stone dagger has been abandoned here.
A grey robe lies crumpled on the ground here.

objects.short: a pair of heavy stone boots
objects.ground: A pair of heavy-looking stone boots are lying here.

extras.text: Oof!  How could anyone walk around in these things?  It looks like an ordinary pair of leather boots, except that the boots are actually made of a dark grey stone!  Maybe they were turned into stone by magic, because not even dwarves wear stone boots.

objects.ground: A stone jug is lying on the floor here.

extras.text: It's a large, heavy jug made of grey stone.  Sloshing sounds inside indicate some kind of liquid.

objects.ground: A stone jug is lying on the floor here.

extras.text: It's a alrge, heavy jug made of grey stone.  Sloshing sounds inside indicate some kind of liquid.

objects.ground: A heavy loaf of bread has been left here.

extras.text: Made of the finest stone-ground wheat and kneaded with extra grit, this bread is much heavier than a normal loaf.  It looks pretty filling.

objects.ground: A giant stone statue of a sorcerer towers above you.

extras.text: This monolith is huge and towers to nearly the top of the caverns. The sorcerer is in a battle pose casting lightning in one hand and brandishing a dagger of stone in the other. The sorcerer is wearing a light battle robe and has an amulet dangling on his chest.
On his chest is an amulet wit odd inscriptions. It even seems to glow somewhat with a circular pattern within as though it has had a piece removed.....
The dagger looks crude but sharp none the less. It also seems to glow with the same energy as the lightning?

shops.no_such_item1: %s I'm not running a bloom'n general store here!
shops.no_such_item2: %s You don't seem to have that.
shops.do_not_buy: %s I'm not here to BUY things. I sell, that's it.
shops.missing_cash2: %s Bugger off! You don't have the cash.
shops.message_sell: %s I'll give you %d coins for that.

triggers.name: Stone-statue-ring--dagger
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if %object.vnum% == 5102 return 1 wait 2s mecho &4&bThe eyes of the immense stone statue glow &1&bred&0 &4&bas a deafening hum shakes the cavern!&0 wait 2 s mecho &3&bThe statue comes to life!&0 wait 1 s mecho &bThe statue makes your soul quake with a vicious&0 &1&bROOOOOAAAAAARRRRRR!&0 mecho You panic, but you can not escape! wait 1 s mecho &6&bThe statue shouts 'I will free you my master!'&0 wait 4 mecho &3&bThe statue starts casting a spell...&0 wait 3 s mecho &3&bThe statue's molecules loosen and eventually compress into a ball of light!&0 wait 4 mecho &6&bThe ball disappears like&0 &4&blightning&0 &6&bwith a loud crackle of energy!&0 wait 4 mecho A small stone dagger falls from its place, a gift for freedom. m_run_room_trig 5101 mpurge stone-ring mpurge statue else return 0 mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% offers %object.shortdesc% to %self.name%. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% does not stir. msend %actor% You offer up %object.shortdesc% to %self.name%, but there is no reaction. endif endif

triggers.name: Arre Matu refuse
triggers.commands: switch %object.vnum% default return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'What is this? I have no need for %object.shortdesc%.' done

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_greet
triggers.commands: wait 2 switch %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% case 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Have you returned to join the Brotherhood?  You will be rewarded for your success with wonderful training, but only those pure of mind will complete the &6&bquest&0.' break case 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Remember my story.  I long for the return of my prized bronze sash.' wait 1s emote shakes her head. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I was told it looked wonderful on me.  %actor.name%, can you track down these fiends?' mecho &0 wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% whispers to you, 'Please?' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Long ago some ruthless &6&bfiends&0 made off with it.' break case 3 case 4 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Have you recovered my bronze sash from those desert thieves?' break default switch %actor.race% *      case ADD RESTRICTED RACES HERE *        halt *        break default if %actor.class% /= warrior && (%actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 25) look %actor.name% wait 1 snicker msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well hello, what have you come &6&bhere&0 for?' smile %actor.name% endif done done

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_speech1
triggers.commands: if %actor.class% /= Warrior switch %actor.race% *    case ADD RESTRICTED RACES HERE *      if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 25 *        msend %actor% &1Your race may not subclass to monk.&0 *      endif *      halt *      break default wait 2 if %actor.level% < 10 eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Perhaps in time, after you've gained a little more experience, we can talk more.' elseif %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 25 wait 2 chuckle msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Do you not know where you are?  Silly youth.' wait 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Why did you come to my chambers if you do not have a reason?' wait 1s frown wait 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I suppose you are here for the same &6&breason&0 as everyone else that ever visits me.' sigh else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, you are no longer suited for my teachings.  So I shall not waste my time with you.' endif done else wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, you are not well suited to my teaching.  So I shall not waste my time with you.' endif

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_speech2
triggers.commands: if %actor.class% /= Warrior switch %actor.race% *    case ADD RESTRICTED RACES HERE *      if %actor.level% <= 25 *        msend %actor% &1Your race may not subclass to monk.&0 *      endif *      halt *      break default wait 2 if !%actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% if %actor.level% >= 10 grumble msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes a reason...' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You do not know much do you?' roll mutter wait 3s eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Are you certain you wish to study as a monk and have strength over mind and body alike?' elseif %actor.level% < 10 eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Perhaps in time, after you've gained a little more experience, we can talk more.' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, you are no longer suited for my teachings.  So I shall not waste my time with you.' endif endif done else wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, you are not well suited to my teaching.  So I shall not waste my time with you.' endif

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_speech3
triggers.commands: if %actor.class% /= Warrior switch %actor.race% *    case ADD RESTRICTED RACES HERE *      if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 25 *        msend %actor% &1Your race may not subclass to monk.&0 *      endif *      halt *      break default if %speech% /= yes wait 2 if %actor.level% >= 10 if %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% == 0 quest start monk_subclass %actor.name% Mon bow msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'It is wonderful to hear of others wanting to join the Brotherhood of the Monks.  You will be rewarded for your success with wonderful training, but only those pure of mind will complete the &6&bquest&0.' mecho &0 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You may ask about your &6&b[subclass progress]&0 or at any time.' elseif %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% == 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Thank you.  I'm certain those &6&bfiends&0 still have it.' endif elseif %actor.level% < 10 eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Perhaps in time, after you've gained a little more experience, we can talk more.' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, you are no longer suited for my teachings.  So I shall not waste my time with you.' endif else wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% == 0 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'It is too bad then, we could use more in our ranks, but only if they truly wish to belong.' smile elseif %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% == 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Then I am unwilling to continue your training.' endif wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Begone then. msend %actor% Your eyes blink repeatedly and you find yourself elsewhere. mechoaround %actor% There is a brief sparkle, and %actor.name% is sent elsewhere. mteleport %actor% 58001 endif done endif

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_speech4
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% == 1 quest advance monk_subclass %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Alright, well sit back.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Usually people come in here promising me the return of something long lost of mine.' scratch wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'The thing is, I have not always led this life.  When I was young I was quite the rabble-rouser.' emote looks wistfully for a moment. wait 4s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well, it is rather embarrassing, but...  I miss my old sash, and I want it back.' wait 2s emote shakes her head. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I was told it looked wonderful on me.' wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, '%actor.name%, can you recover it?' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% whispers to you, 'Please?' wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Long ago some ruthless &6&bfiends&0 made off with it.' endif

triggers.name: quest_exit_arre
triggers.commands: wait 2 sigh say Again, my time has been wasted.  Very well, leave. msend %actor% %self.name% waves her arms, sending you out of her chamber. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% sweeps her arms through the air, sending %actor.name% away. mteleport %actor% 58001 msend %actor% You blink and find yourself back on the pebbled path! mforce %actor% look

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_speech5
triggers.argument_list: fiend? fiends? who who? fiend fiends
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% == 2 sigh %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes, fiends.  The filthy thieves from the blistering sands in North Caelia.' shiver wait 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Personally I enjoy much cooler weather, but they seem to manage themselves fine there.' wait 2 grin msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I would not mind seeing them vanish outright, however.' emote sighs again. wait 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Enough, I have grown tired of your company.  You bring back bad memories.' quest advance monk_subclass %actor.name% mecho %self.name% dismisses you. mteleport all 58025 mforce all look mgoto 58024 endif

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_receieve
triggers.commands: wait 2 switch %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% case 1 case 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Funny, I don't even remember telling you what you were questing for.' break case 3 *got sash without getting sash themselves msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'How on earth did you get me this?  Did you come by it through your own means?' eye %actor.name% emote shakes her head. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I cannot help those who cheat themselves.' break case 4 emote cheers wildly, dancing all around the room. wait 3 emote pants heavily for a moment calming down. wait 1 shake %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Wonderful, this shows your true dedication to helping one of the brotherhood.' grin wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Type &9&b'subclass'&0 to proceed.' quest complete monk_subclass %actor.name% break default msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'What a wonderful sash, thank you.' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Shame you were not questing for me, this is a great prize you have given me.' done mjunk sash

triggers.name: room_monkquest_entry
triggers.commands: switch %cmd% case b case bo return 0 halt done wforce %actor% bow wforce monk_quest_priest emote smiles broadly, pressing in a crack in the wall. wdoor 58025 east flags a wdoor 58025 east room 58024 wdoor 58025 east name heavy stone door wdoor 58025 east key -1 wdoor 58025 east description A heavy slab of stone sits in your way. wait 3 wecho %get.mob_shortdesc[5131]% presses a little harder, fully opening the stone door. wechoaround %actor% %get.mob_shortdesc[5131]% points to the east and nudges %actor.name% forward. wsend %actor% %get.mob_shortdesc[5131]% points to the east and nudges you forward.

triggers.name: priest_openwall_entry_hint
triggers.commands: msend %actor% As you enter this tiny alcove, you feel compelled to pay respectful homage to the priest before you.

triggers.name: close_wall_arreroom_entry
triggers.commands: wait 5 wecho The stone door slides shut! wdoor 58025 east purge wat 58025 wecho The stone door slides shut!

triggers.name: monk_subclass_quest_arre_status
triggers.commands: switch %actor.quest_stage[monk_subclass]% case 1 wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'It is wonderful to hear of others wanting to join the Brotherhood of the Monks.  You will be rewarded for your success with wonderful training, but only those pure of mind will complete the &6&bquest&0.' break case 2 wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Alright, well sit back.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Usually people come in here promising me the return of something long lost of mine.' scratch wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'The thing is, I have not always lead this life.  When I was young I was quite the rabble-rouser.' emote looks wistfully for a moment. wait 4s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well, it is rather embarrassing, but...  I miss my old sash, and I want it back.' wait 2s emote shakes her head. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I was told it looked wonderful on me.' wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, '%actor.name%, can you recover it?' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% whispers to you, 'Please?' wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Long ago some ruthless &6&bfiends&0 made off with it.' break case 3 case 4 wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Have you recovered my sash from those thieves out west?  If you return my sash, I will complete your initiation as a monk.' break default if %actor.class% /= Warrior switch %actor.race% *        case ADD RESTRICTED RACES HERE *          if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 25 *            msend %actor% &1Your race may not subclass to monk.&0 *          endif *          halt *          break default wait 2 if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 25 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You are not trying to join the Brotherhood.' elseif %actor.level% < 10 eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Perhaps in time, after you've gained a little more experience, we can talk more.' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, you are no longer suited for my teachings.  So I shall not waste my time with you.' endif done else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, you are not well suited to my teaching.  So I shall not waste my time with you.' endif done

triggers.name: lantern shows the path
triggers.commands: switch %arg% case l case la case lan case lant case lante case lanter case lantern wforce %actor% look lantern wechoaround %actor% %actor.name% looks at the stone lantern. wait 2s wecho An eerie &3&bglow&0 begins emitting from the lantern... wait 5s wdoor 58001 west room 58017 wecho The light reveals a well-concealed break in the rocky hills to the west! wait 20s wecho The light begins to flicker and fade... wait 5s wdoor 58001 west purge wecho The passage west is obscured again as the glow of the lantern fades. done return 0

rooms.name: On a Ladder in a Hot Pit
rooms.description: You are hanging onto a hot metal ladder, slowly descending into the depths. The ladder touches bottom just below this spot, or you can climb up the ladder, if you prefer.

rooms.name: The End of the Rocky Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing at the end of a rocky, rough-hewn, tunnel.  The tunnel continues on to the north of here, or you can climb up a metal ladder to the higher levels above.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rough-hewn rocky tunnel.  From here, the tunnel continues on to the north and south.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in a rocky, rough-hewn, tunnel.  From this spot, you can continue on down the rocky tunnels to the west or south.

rooms.name: An Intersection in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a four-way intersection in the rocky tunnels.  The larger of the two tunnels continues on to the north and south of here, while a smaller tunnel runs east and west.

rooms.name: A T-crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a large, rough-hewn, rocky tunnel.  The main tunnel runs on to the north and south from here.  A smaller tunnel leads off to the west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in a large, rocky, rough-hewn passageway.  From here, you can continue on to the east or south.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rocky, rough-hewn, tunnel.  From here, this large tunnel continues on to the east and west.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rough-hewn, rocky tunnel.  From this spot, you can continue on down this wide tunnel to the west or east.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Rocky Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in the entrance to some rocky caverns to the south.  You can hear some strange noises coming up from the south and you are certain that some strange creature must make its home down there.  From here, you can also follow a wide, rough-hewn, rocky tunnel on to the east and west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in this rough-hewn, rocky passageway.  From here, the tunnel continues on to the north and west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in bend in a wide, rough-hewn, rocky tunnel.  From here, you can continue on to the north or west.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rocky, rough-hewn passageway.  The tunnel continues on to the east and west from this spot.

rooms.name: A T-crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a large, rough-hewn and rocky tunnel.  The main tunnel continues on to the east and west from here, and a slightly smaller tunnel branches off to the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in a rocky passageway.  The tunnel is quite unremarkable in appearance and continues on to the north and east.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a north-south running rocky tunnel.

rooms.name: A Split in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a three-way intersection in some rocky, rough-hewn tunnels.  All three tunnels are roughly the same size, heading off to the north, east, and south from here.  None look particularly inviting.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in the rocky tunnels here.  The wide, rough-hewn passage continues on to the west and south of here.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a twisting section of these rocky passageways.  From here, you can see more bends in the rocky tunnels to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: The wide, rocky tunnel bends suddenly here, continuing on to the west and south.

rooms.name: An Intersection in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a four-way intersection in the rocky tunnels.  From here, you can move on to the north, east, west, or south.  The southern tunnel appears to be narrower than the others.  A light mist seems to be seeping into this area from the west.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnel near the Wall of Mist
rooms.description: You are standing in a rocky tunnel just east of a wall of nearly solid mists.  Although it's difficult to be sure, there would seem to be a ledge to the west, probably signifying a nasty drop though the mists.  You can also simply follow the rocky tunnels to the east or north.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a T-crossing in the rocky tunnels.  From here, these rocky, rough-hewn passageways continue on to the north, east, and south.  You can see some kind of major intersection just east of here.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in the rocky tunnels here.  From here, the rough-hewn passages continue on to the south and west.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a twisting section of the rocky tunnels.  The tunnels continue on to the north and east, where you can see even more turns in these wide, rough-hewn passageways.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: This wide, rough-hewn passageway turns suddenly here.  The rocky tunnels continue on to the east and south from this spot.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Stony Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in the entrance to the Stony Caverns to the north.  You can hear some weird sounding noises coming from the caverns.  Some strange creatures must make their homes in there.  You can enter the caverns to the north, of you can follow the rough-hewn tunnels here to the east or west.

rooms.name: Under the Murky Well
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky tunnels just below what appears to be a murky well.  There appears to be a ladder just above you that you could probably use to climb up the well.  You could also just continue on down the rocky tunnels to the west and south.

rooms.name: Inside the Murky Well
rooms.description: You are holding on to a ladder set into the side of a murky well.  You can easily climb up or down from here to see what lies beyond.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a narrow, rocky north-south running tunnel.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a large, rough-hewn, east-west tunnel.  This rocky tunnel appears to be the main tunnel here, or you could follow a smaller passage northward.  A light mist seems to be seeping into this area from the tunnel to the west.

rooms.name: The Misty T-Crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a t-crossing in some rocky tunnels.  The area is rather misty, the source seeming to be to the west of here.  You can also follow the tunnels east and south from here.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels near the Misty Chasm
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky tunnels just south of the Misty Chasm. North leads to almost certain obliteration in the chasm.  East leads to an uncertain fate in these rocky tunnels.  Neither choice is comforting.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rocky tunnel running north and south from here.  A light mist fills the area and appears to be coming from the north.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in some rocky tunnels.  From here, the tunnels continue on to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a twisting section of these rocky passageways.  From here, you can see more bends in the rocky tunnels to the north and west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in some rocky tunnels.  From here, the tunnels continue on to the east and south.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a three-way intersection of some rough-hewn, rocky tunnels.  The main tunnels run north and south, while a slightly smaller tunnel runs to the west.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rocky, rough-hewn, passageway.  This wide tunnel runs to the north and south from here and is otherwise unremarkable.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in some rocky tunnels.  From here, this wide, rough-hewn passageway continues on to the north and east.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rough-hewn, rocky tunnel.  From this area, you can continue on down these tunnels to the east and west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a wide, rocky tunnel.  From here, this rough-hewn passageway continues on to the west and north.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a wide, rocky passage here.  The main tunnel runs north and south, while a smaller, dark tunnel runs east from here.

rooms.name: A Dark Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark, narrow passageway.  From here, this rocky, rough-hewn tunnel continues on to the west and south.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a wide, rough-hewn tunnel here.  The main tunnel runs east and west, while a smaller, dark tunnel runs north from here.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Marble Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in the entrance to some remarkable looking marble caverns. The smoothness of this area is in sharp contrast to the rocky tunnels all around it.  You can enter the Marble Caverns to the east, or you can follow the rough-hewn rocky tunnels to the south and west.  You can hear some strange slithering sounds coming from the east.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in the wide, rocky tunnels here.  The rough-hewn passage continues on to the north and west from here.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the entrance of the Rocky Temple that lies just north of here.  You can enter the Rocky Temple to the north, or you can continue down some rocky tunnels to the south.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Gallery
rooms.description: You are standing in the gallery area of the Stone Temple.  There are many sculptings and carvings in the walls here, but unfortunately you realize that most of these are permanently affixed, so you won't be selling them anytime soon.  You can leave the Stone Temple to the south of here, or you can check out more of the gallery to the north, east, or west.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Gallery
rooms.description: You are standing in the gallery area of the Stone Temple.  There are many sculptings and carvings in the walls here, but unfortunately you realize that most of these are permanently affixed, so you won't be selling them anytime soon.  You can continue wandering about the gallery to the north and east of here.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Gallery
rooms.description: You are standing in the gallery area of the Stone Temple.  There are many sculptings and carvings in the walls here, but unfortunately you realize that most of these are permanently affixed, so you won't be selling them anytime soon.  The gallery stretches on to the north and west of this spot.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Gallery
rooms.description: You are standing in the gallery area of the Stone Temple.  There are many sculptings and carvings in the walls here, but unfortunately you realize that most of these are permanently affixed, so you won't be selling them anytime soon.  The Stone Temple proper is north of here, or you can take in more of the gallery to the south and east.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Gallery
rooms.description: You are standing in the gallery area of the Stone Temple.  There are many sculptings and carvings in the walls here, but unfortunately you realize that most of these are permanently affixed, so you won't be selling them anytime soon.  The Stone Temple proper is just north of here, or you can wander around the gallery more to the south, east, or west.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Gallery
rooms.description: You are standing in the gallery area of the Stone Temple.  There are many sculptings and carvings in the walls here, but unfortunately you realize that most of these are permanently affixed, so you won't be selling them anytime soon.  You can enter the Stone Temple proper to the north, or continue wandering through the gallery to the south or west from here.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple continues on to the north and east from here.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Gallery is just south of here, while the Temple continues on to the west, north, and east from this spot.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple continues on to the north, east, and west, or you can enter the Gallery to the south.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Gallery is just south of here, and the Temple continues on to the north, east, and west of this area.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple continues on to the north and west of here.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  From here, the Stone Temple continues on to the north, south, and east.

extras.text: The stone looks very scratched up compared to the others you have seen.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  From here, the Stone Temple continues on to the north, south, east, and west.

rooms.name: South of the Stone Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple Altar is just north of here, and the Temple itself continues on to the east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple continues on to the north, south, east, and west from here.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  There is a small alcove just east of here, and the Temple continues on to the north, east, and south.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple continues on to the south and east.

rooms.name: West of the Stone Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple Altar is just east of here, while the Temple itself continues on to the west and south.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing by the evil Stone Temple Altar.  The blood-red marble altar almost hides the blood of past sacrifices...  But not quite!  There is a small alcove just north of here, and the Temple itself continues on to the west, south, and east.

rooms.name: East of the Stone Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple Altar is just west of this spot.  The Stone Temple continues on to the south and east of here.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Stone Temple.  There is nothing rough-hewn about this area; 100% polished marble walls, floors, and pillars attest to the devotion of the stone worshippers who built it.  The Stone Temple continues on to the south and west of here.

rooms.name: Behind the Stone Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing just north of the evil Stone Temple Altar.  This is a small alcove and, by the stench of the place, you imagine this is where the evil stone priests leave the bodies of those sacrificed at the altar.  The only exit from this alcove is to the south.

rooms.name: The Marble Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in a cavern carved from the purest of marble.  The walls are smooth, but unsculpted.  You can hear slithering sounds from all around you.  The entrance to the caverns is just west of here, and the cavern proper continues on to the north, east, and south.

rooms.name: The Marble Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in a cavern carved from the purest of marble.  The walls are smooth, but unsculpted.  You can hear slithering sounds from all around you.  The cavern continues on to the north and east.

extras.text: On his chest is an amulet with odd inscriptions. It even seems to glow somewhat with a circular pattern within as though it has had a piece removed.....
The sorcerer's dagger looks crude but sharp nonetheless.  It also seems to glow with the same energy as the lightning?

rooms.name: The Marble Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in a cavern carved from the purest of marble.  The walls are smooth, but unsculpted.  You can hear slithering sounds from all around you.  The cavern continues on to the east and south.

rooms.name: The Marble Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in a cavern carved from the purest of marble.  The walls are smooth, but unsculpted.  You can hear slithering sounds from all around you.  The cavern continues on to the south and west.

rooms.name: The Marble Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in a cavern carved from the purest of marble.  The walls are smooth, but unsculpted.  You can hear slithering sounds from all around you.  The cavern continues on to the south, west, and north.

rooms.name: The Marble Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in a cavern carved from the purest of marble.  The walls are smooth, but unsculpted.  You can hear slithering sounds from all around you.  The cavern continues on to the north and west.

rooms.name: The Rocky Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky, rough-hewn caverns.  You can hear strange noises echoing off the walls around you.  The cavern entrance is just north of here.  The caverns extend on to the east, south, and west from here.

rooms.name: The Rocky Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky, rough-hewn caverns.  You can hear strange noises echoing off the walls around you.  The caverns continue on to the east and south from here.

rooms.name: The Rocky Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky, rough-hewn caverns.  You can hear strange noises echoing off the walls around you.  The caverns continue on to the south and west from here.

rooms.name: The Rocky Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky, rough-hewn caverns.  You can hear strange noises echoing off the walls around you.  The caverns continue on to the north and east from here.

rooms.name: The Rocky Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky, rough-hewn caverns.  You can hear strange noises echoing off the walls around you.  The caverns continue on to the west, north, and east from here.

rooms.name: The Rocky Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some rocky, rough-hewn caverns.  You can hear strange noises echoing off the walls around you.  The caverns continue on to the north and west from here.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in a small, rough-hewn, rocky tunnel.  From here, this small tunnel continues on to the south and east.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in a rocky, rough-hewn, tunnel.  From here, this small tunnel continues on to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in a rough-hewn, rocky tunnel.  The tunnel is wide and continues on to the west and south of this spot.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a rocky, rough-hewn passageway.  This tunnel continues on to the north and south from here.  You can hear some strange slithering sounds coming from somewhere to the north.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a wide, rough-hewn tunnel.  This wide passageway continues on to the north and south from here.

rooms.name: The Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a wide, rocky passageway.  From here, this rough-hewn tunnel continues on to the east and west.  Strange slithering sounds seem to be emanating from someplace to the east.

rooms.name: A Crossing in the Rocky Tunnels
rooms.description: Two large, rough-hewn, rocky tunnels cross each others path here, providing a number of exits for your adventuring pleasure.  Choose from amongst north, east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Stone Temple Alcove
rooms.description: You are standing in an alcove of the evil Stone Temple.  The smooth and highly polished marble walls of this alcove are a monument to the dedication the evil stone priests have inspired in their many followers.  The only exit from the alcove is to the west.

rooms.name: The Secret Alcove
rooms.description: You are standing in a hidden alcove of the evil Stone Temple.  From here, you can try to get back into the Temple to the east, or you can climb down the ladder to explore the depths below.

extras.text: It looks like the other side has been carefully fitted to the wall. You'd be willing to bet that you're looking at the other side of a secret door!

rooms.name: On a Ladder in a Fiery Hole
rooms.description: You are maintaining a precarious hold on some niches carved into the walls of this black obsidian pit.  Occassional puffs of smoke and flames wash over your body, making it difficult to remain here, but somehow you manage to hold on.  You can either climb out of the pit, or continue down deeper toward the fiery tunnels below.

rooms.name: The Stony Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some stony caverns here.  The floor is littered with small, smooth stones.  The walls are smooth, but not polished.  The cavern entrance is just south of here.  The caverns themselves continue on to the west, north, and east from here.

rooms.name: The Stony Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some stony caverns here.  The floor is littered with small, smooth stones.  The walls are smooth, but not polished.  The caverns continue on to the north and west from here.

rooms.name: The Stony Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some stony caverns here.  The floor is littered with small, smooth stones.  The walls are smooth, but not polished.  The caverns continue on to the north and east from here.

rooms.name: The Stony Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some stony caverns here.  The floor is littered with small, smooth stones.  The walls are smooth, but not polished.  The caverns continue on to the south and east from here.

rooms.name: The Stony Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some stony caverns here.  The floor is littered with small, smooth stones.  The walls are smooth, but not polished.  The caverns continue on to the east, south, and west from here.

rooms.name: The Stony Caverns
rooms.description: You are standing in some stony caverns here.  The floor is littered with small, smooth stones.  The walls are smooth, but not polished.  The caverns continue on to the south and west from here.

rooms.name: A Small Stone Alcove (NOT USED)
rooms.description: This room is small and carved into solid grey stone.  There are some small scratches in the otherwise smoothly carved walls.  There is a little wet spot on the stone ground, seeming to come from below somehow.  Distantly to the south is the Temple Altar, barely visible through the opening back that direction.

rooms.name: Arre Matu's Private Chambers (NOT USED)
rooms.description: This is Arre Matu's private room in the Stone Temple.  It is sparsely decorated, a lone rug covers barely a quarter of the hard floor, and there is a long stool on which to meditate in one of the corners.  The room itself is oddly shaped, having the walls slope up to the ceiling rather than have the two meet at a right angle.  The east wall is flat, while those to the north, south and west seem to all curve together.  There is no exit in any direction.
